TITLE.P: Project support with expertise in the planning and operation system Hastus

SHORT_DESCR.P: Sporveien has procured and put into operation the planning operation system Hastus for planning and operating public transport. Sporveien now needs project support and management for the following tasks:
— development, upgrades and implementation of new modules in Hastusd,
— define architecture and specifications when a new environment shall be set up / established and implemented for new upgrades of Hastus versions,
— development and establishment of plan processes for public transport operators,
— implementation of a system support on Hastus for planning processes for route plans, coach management, staffing, reports and traffic information,
— establishment of integration systems across Hasus and other trade systems,

Only Centigo AB has documented expertise in project support for the planning and operations system Hastus, in combination with experience and competence in the planning and operation of public transport.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: 2 year contract with an option for an extension for a further 2 years.
